import React from 'react' import Search from '../../components/Search' import Header from '../../components/Header' import MovieCard from '../../components/Movies/MovieCard' import Icon from '../../components/Icon' import '../../components/Search/Search.css' import Logo from '../../components/TMDB-Image' import Movie_API from '../../api/Movie_API' let response; const submitButton = async (e) => { e.preventDefault() const KEY = process.env.REACT_APP_API response = await Movie_API.get('/discover/movie', { params:{ api_key: KEY, language: 'en-US', include_adult: 'false', page: '1', with_genres: event.value.id } }) } const Filter = () => { return(
Search using these filters ⬇️
) } export default Filter
